have I dealt with you according to your

not dealt with us after our sins nor
rewarded us according to our iniquities
that's the verse right there he is not
dealt with us after our sins nor

for as the heaven is high above the

pities his children so Yahweh pities
them that fear him brain knows our frame
he remembers that we are dust as for man

way he his angels that excel in strength

Commandments and want to keep his
